hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah designated Dhul-Hulaifah as the Miqat for the people of Al-Madinah, Al-Juhfah for the people Ash-sham and Egypt, Dhat 'Irq for the people Al-'Iraq, Qarn for the people of Najd and Yalamlam for the people of Yemen

chapter.eng-name: The Miqat of the People of Al-'Iraq
